summary: Provides a comprehensive programmatic interface to create, read, update, delete and manage the full spectrum of AWS SageMaker resources—including models, endpoints, training jobs, pipelines, experiments, and related artifacts—while handling tagging, validation, and utility operations for ML workflow automation.
business_intent: Facilitates automated orchestration and lifecycle management of SageMaker components to streamline machine‑learning development, deployment, and monitoring within AWS environments.
